page.title: 12THE PEOPLE OF MARKS TEY - 11
page.content: is in a{dangerous}position because of the road. More people would use the playing field if it was on the{estate. (T.Morris & N.Clement) {RELIGION.}We found out that {90% }of the People in Mark's Tey belong to the Church of England.Of the {200} people we asked this was{180} people.Seven people{(3\%)}belong to the Methodist Church and three people{(1\%)}belong to the Roman Catholic Church.We also found that 10 people{(5\%)}belong to some other religious group.33 are regular church attenders but only 24 people{(12%)}go regularly to Marks Tey Church.This tells us that of the 180 people we asked who say they belong to the Church of England,many must not have very strong religious feelings because if they had they would probably go to church more often. (L.Huke & S.Child)
